title: Aa! Megami-sama!: Chichaitte Koto wa Benri da ne
original_name: ああっ女神さまっ 小っちゃいって事は便利だねっ
sinopse: A large collection consisting of the adventures of the Goddesses featured in the anime and manga series Ah My Goddess. Parodies of other works, and a large number of jokes pervade this series of shorts in which the Goddesses torture and hang out with their friend Gan the rat.
